long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Short Ride by GameTornado is a quirky and darkly comedic addition to the world of casual browser games. As a sequel to the notoriously challenging Short Life, this game continues to serve up the developer's signature blend of platform challenges with an extra helping of morbid humor. In Short Ride, players navigate through a series of increasingly perilous courses, aiming not just to finish but to survive.

The game's appeal lies largely in its simplicity and the absurdity of its challenges. Players take control of a rather unfortunate character who must ride various two-wheeled vehicles—or sometimes just their own two feet—through obstacle-laden tracks. Each level is a creatively designed deathtrap, filled with spikes, explosives, and a host of other hazards that can end the ride in a split second.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Short Ride Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
